forum.content:
I am looking for a girl who lives in Taiwan for about two weeks. Date 3/7 ~ 3/20.
I only know that her name is Ava. She's a Thai girl living in Malaysia. I miss her so much, and I really love her.
(Attach photos. If anyone knows her, please let me know how to contact her .)
forum.title: I'm looking for a girl........
